reviews.review: Muito bom jogo de terror com varias dlcs, jogabilidade muito boa porem a desvantagens como hackers e bugs,porem é muito bom
Love this game for mindless fun. Note not fun in high rank

Als Überlebender ist das Spiel mittlerweile schwieriger durch die Perks der Killer geworden, aber es macht dennoch Spaß um sein Leben  zu rennen. Ich finde persönlich das Spiel etwas unausgeglichen und als Killer hat man ewige Wartezeiten. Aber um Abends mit Freunden eine Runde als Überlebender zu spielen ist Dead by Daylight vollkommen in Ordnung
好游戏.希望永远活下去.
intense butt cletching after vaulting a window hoping dedicated doesn't fuck you in the ass and proceed to let the killer hit you through the window
Arkadaşlarınla oynayınca eğlenceli olan güzel bir oyun

Das Spiel ist einfach klasse, 10 von 10 Punkten.Wenn ein Spiel das Geld Wert ist dann DBD, Spaß, Unterhaltung, eine große Community und es hat starkes Suchtpotenzial. Wer überlegt es sich zu holen, der sollte nicht lange zögern und einfach zuschlagen.
摸宝暴走蹲蘑菇，弹射羽毛溜屠夫。
Great game to play as it feels very immersive with its horror experience
Ist ein tolles Spiel obwohl es teilweise etwas rum Bug.
หาห้องโคดนานเลย
Люблю и одновременно ненавижу эту игру

this game is really cool, but also very difficult for new players to get into. the game gives you no real direction, and makes very little effort to try and teach you how to play... on top of that you will surely be matched against killers that are very experienced... that said if you are willing to put in the time the game is a lot of fun, just prepare to be very frustrated.

Hem tek başınıza hem arkadaşlarınız ile birlikte oynabileceğiniz mükemmel bir oyun.Her zaman güncelleme ile birlikte güncel tutuluyor size uzun süreli bir oynanış sunucaktır.Arkadaşlarınız ile oynayıp bu zevki daha da katlayabilirsiniz.9/10
With the July 2022 update, unless you want to die by a killer, skip the game

Ótimo para se jogar com os amigos, vai lhe render horas de diversão e risadas. Tem bos gráficos, excelente sonorização e ótima ambientação, proporcionando-lhe o sentimento de medo e susto, característico de jogos de terror. :)
엔티티 이 새끼는 사실 희생제가 아니라 버그로 생존자들을 고문하는거 아닐까
Divertido juego hasta que te campea un Leatherface.
DBD, wow so much love has put into this game... cross-play and cross-platform. I wish every developer would do this. Amazing game that i love playing with my friends all the time, thank you!

So far the game has been awesome. Loved it so much. The gameplay is simple and easy.
The one problem is the matchmaking other than that tge game is worth trying out.
赞！这游戏游戏技巧很深 虽说有点bug但个人认为不特别影响游戏体验 游戏至今仍不断更新 也没遇到排不到人的问题
下手くそなりに楽しくプレイさせてもらってます。
Pues da miedo y te asusta y luego a veces te matan
Hitboxes seems a bit messed up but it is definitely enjoyable with friends, scary too so that all that matters, worth the price especially when on sale.
Um jogo Muito bom para jogar com os amigos(sobreviventes), ou sozinho(killer)
great game! love it been playing it for three years and it never gets old.

รอห้องนานมาก 20 นาทีขึ้น

Not bad alone, better with others
este juego es impresionante sobre todo con amigos
You'll love it and hate it at the same time
因为这款游戏认识的steam 不知不觉过了那么久玩了那么多游戏没写过评测 虽然现在不怎么玩了 但第一篇测评我还是觉得应该留给这个游戏
Мне очень нравится эта игра,у каждого свои вкусы,рекомендую посмотреть геймплей и там решить.
Pretty decent Game. Also PEBBLE IS THE BEST PERK !
挺吓人的，但是还是蛮有趣的。新手要小心哦，因为我也是新手所以被屠夫按在地上摩擦，被虐的欲哭无泪0.0

Good game but im irritated at finding a killer lobby. i can spend 10 minutes waiting as killer but survivor i immediately match into a lobby. Kinda sucks but i like the game

Edit: Killer matchmaking is so much better now. It only takes about 3 minutes
